title: Launch problem
body: When i press launch in my client it just disappears without loading log in screen. When i tried to update to open beta i discovered there is no download button. And although I went to help then fix and scanned my downloaded data thi problem stills exist. What should I do. Just for further info this problem existed before and i downloaded LoL again  after deleting it. It worked properly but the next day the problem still exited. Please i need your advice.

replies.body:
It sounds like the root of your issues may lie in an unstable connection to our servers. Most of the time, this is affected by incompatible local network settings that simply don't play nicely with League. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
